tool_description:
Duedil is a provider of private company information for due diligence. Duedil allows users to identify, compare, and screen potential suppliers and clients and track private company performance.

The Duedil API allows developers to access and integrate the Duedil functionality and data with other applications. Some example API methods include searching companies and retrieving company information.
name: Duedil Business Information
title: Duedil Business Information

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for companies in the UK and Ireland.

api_list.name: Company Profile
api_list.description: The /uk/company/ endpoint returns information about companies registered in the UK.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://duedil.p.rapidapi.com/uk/company/04250459.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "duedil.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://duedil.p.rapidapi.com/uk/company/{company_number}.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "duedil.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
